repnme.cdata!:
Ecuador - Financial Sector Adjustment
            Operation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan supports an ongoing
            program of financial sector reform. With the proceeds of
            this loan, the government hopes to achieve  (i) strengthened
            financial institutions (FIs); (ii) more efficient
            intermediation; and (iii) development of the capital market.
            The benefits that are expected from the program include:
            (i) an increase in the rate of economic growth; and (ii) a
            more resilient and efficient financial sector.
